name: cake slice
description:
The very first game I've made in my life. It's a short visual novel, about 10 minutes long. Made for My First Game Jam.

Didn't have time to figure out how to put credits in-game, so for the purpose of correct references:

Made using the Ren'Py visual novel engine

MUSIC:

Themes From Frost by Rest You Sleeping Giant

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rest_You_Sleeping_Giant/Frost/Rest_You_Sleeping_Giant_-_Frost_-_01_Themes_From_Frost

TALK by Kenichi Tsuchiya, From the Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne soundtrack

SFX:

https://freesound.org/people/robertvoice/sounds/16...

Ownership of these assets goes to their respective creators. Used for educational purposes only.
